articles.title: Amid trying year, Olympic gold shone even brighter for Charlie McAvoy and his family
articles.description:
"I kept telling them, 'We did it. We did it.' Because you can't do it by yourself."

The post Amid trying year, Olympic gold shone even brighter for Charlie McAvoy and his family appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie McAvoy won Olympic gold with Team USA in 2022, boosting local pride.
McAvoy emphasized teamwork, stating, 'We did it' to his family after the win.
His victory comes after a challenging year, inspiring Boston residents facing adversity.

articles.title: The hidden costs of buying and owning a home in Boston and beyond
articles.description:
“Boston’s climate plays a big role in why home maintenance costs run above the national average,” said Morgan Olsen, a home expert at Thumbtack.

The post The hidden costs of buying and owning a home in Boston and beyond appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston's home maintenance costs exceed the national average due to local climate factors.
Morgan Olsen from Thumbtack highlights increased expenses for homeowners in Boston.
Residents should budget for higher upkeep costs when purchasing homes in the area.

articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
A surfeit of snow, takeover troubles, and a Dunkin’ development are all part of this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston experienced heavy snowfall this week, affecting travel and local businesses.
Dunkin' announced a new store opening in the Greater Boston area by March 2026.
Local businesses face challenges due to recent takeover troubles impacting the community.
